properties.description:
June 25 2014 - MOHS

Please, give answers to rumors on Facebook Posts.

"In the wake of this increasing mistrust of the government, Ministry of Health sources in Freetown are even claiming that “free health care drugs and other medical supplies sent to Sandaeyaru Village Health Center in Luawa Chiefdom, Kailahun District, have been taken out of the store by community youths and burnt, alleging that the drugs were meant to kill Ebola patients in their communities”.

https://www.facebook.com/newpeopleonline/posts/955263627833255

https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=310077079169141&id=281064805403702
properties.name: Sandaeyaru Village (Luawa Chiefdom) : medical supplies and health drugs have been stollen and burnt.

_storage.name: Hostilities to health workers and vandalism.
